title: Senna Release: Permanent Champion Price Reduction site update

embed.description: We are reducing champion prices on a fixed schedule (based primarily on champion release dates). This plan involves ongoing reductions of BE and RP prices of older champions, as well as increasing the time you have to earn BE between champion releases.

body:
With the release of Senna, Aatrox dropped to 4800 BE.

However, the site states that another champion of 4800 or less cost should also get a price reduction.

Do you know who that champion is?

Also, the table doesn't display Qiyana, Senna and Aphelios.
